reviews.title: Very helpful informative team.
reviews.text: Very helpful informative team. Supportive throughout process. Nice manner

reviews.title: Friendly, knowledgable and efficient service from al...
reviews.text: Friendly, knowledgable and efficient service from all at the company. From initial contact to offer was less than 3 weeks, a great rate and good product perfect for a university student.-

reviews.title: great service and comms
reviews.text: As a Mortgage Intermediary it’s important to have good contacts and timely communications and we recently received exemplary service from the team at Bath BS and Nick T was exceptional in the way that he continued to keep us informed of progress

reviews.title: Fantastic customer service , always happy to help ,...
reviews.text: Fantastic customer service , always happy to help , especially Tom & Adam

reviews.title: Mortgage Port
reviews.text: We sold and were looking at porting our mortgage. Start was good, then it went a little wrong but then resolved very well and professionally

reviews.title: A very complicated case, fantastic support & outcome.
reviews.text: A very complicated case, and slightly off criteria basis, was sensitively assessed by the underwriting team with a positive outcome. This was supported by the fantastic BDM Kerrin White, who listened and liaised between myself and the underwriting team, despite numerous hurdles - I cannot recommend Kerrin any more, as he is a polite, attentive, understanding, fair, and consummate professional. He stood out above even some of the best I have worked with from different lenders over the last 5 years. I would recommend him for an industry award if it were possible. Many thanks.

reviews.title: Specialist new build loan
reviews.text: I had a specialist loan to finance a new build property. The application process and management of the loan drawdowns was very efficient. There was always someone available to speak to with any queries.

reviews.title: Excellent all round Service
reviews.text: From first registering an interest online in order to re-mortgage my property, the service has been fast and very professional. My Mortgage adviser, Tim Randall was excellent. Always handled my correspondence and queries very promptly and efficiently.

reviews.title: A Smooth, Stress-Free Mortgage Experience
reviews.text: I’m extremely impressed with the service I received from Bath Building Society, and especially from my mortgage advisor, Tim. From the very start, Tim has been incredibly supportive, professional, and reassuring. He guided me through every stage of the process, answered all my questions clearly, and helped me complete the forms with confidence. What could have been a stressful experience felt smooth and straightforward thanks to Tim’s calm, positive attitude and attention to detail. He was always quick to respond and very good at explaining what was important—and what I didn’t need to worry about! That made a huge difference. I’m absolutely delighted that my mortgage offer was produced so quickly, in just five working days. The efficiency and personal service I received exceeded all expectations. I genuinely felt looked after throughout the entire process. Thank you to Tim and everyone at Bath Building Society for making this such a positive experience.

reviews.title: Retirement mortgage with exceptional service
reviews.text: Bath Building Society (Tim and the team) provided exceptional service from start to finish. The team was professional, knowledgeable, and genuinely supportive, with a personal touch far superior to anywhere else (we went to other building societies and brokers). The key differences were we weren’t passed from pillar to post, endlessly repeating ourselves to different people filling in forms without context and more importantly treated with respect and listened to. The Retirement Mortgage itself perfectly met our needs too, which is flexible, reliable with longevity, and unlike anything we found elsewhere. It truly feels like a well-kept secret. On top of that, they worked to our timelines, which was a fantastic bonus. Definitely a 5 star service - thank you!

reviews.title: Excellent service
reviews.text: Ian Burch and the team were outstanding with their advice, help and assistance. They were always on hand for any queries or concerns we had and made the whole progress stress free

reviews.title: Arranging our remortgage with Bath Building Society...
reviews.text: Arranging our remortgage with Bath Building Society was an overall very positive experience. In particular the support offered by Tim Randall was excellent. From the initial contact through the application process and beyond Tim guided us, offering appropriate advice and information and we are very grateful for his sage counsel. The underwriting process felt somewhat protracted at times, however, we do appreciate that this may be due to the individuality applied to each individual application.

reviews.title: 5-Star Review for Tim Randall
reviews.text: I had an excellent experience working with Tim as my Mortgage Advisor. As a first-time buyer, the whole process felt overwhelming at first, but Tim made everything clear, manageable, and stress-free. He was incredibly patient, explained every step in simple terms, and always responded quickly whenever I had questions.

reviews.title: The chat service on the intermediaries website is ex...
reviews.text: The chat service on the intermediaries website is excellent

reviews.title: Quick and efficient service
reviews.text: Tom was quick and efficient with his responses and all my questions were answered.

reviews.title: Great BDM
reviews.text: I spoke to Kerrin White regarding a Holiday Let mortgage for my client and he has been nothing but helpful during the start of the process. Answered all of my emails and calls quickly and made sure i was fully aware of the process.

reviews.title: The Best Banking Team Around!
reviews.text: The team at Bath Building Society are always so helpful. I love having an account with them because you always receive a very personalised service where you are speaking to a very helpful representative from their side, you aren't ever kept waiting long for an answer and it is so refreshing and appreciated these days to be speaking directly with a human not endlessly trying to communicate via a 'live chat' or AI bot which many other banks now use. Whenever I have had a query this is responded to usually on the same day, they also keep you informed on any pending decisions. I have to give a special mention to Nick and Natasha who I was working with recently in regards to one of my accounts with them.

reviews.title: Kerrin (BDM) was very helpful and Tom (on live chat)...
reviews.text: Kerrin (BDM) was very helpful and Tom (on live chat) answered my query really quickly. Thanks both.

reviews.title: Had a simple question, which was answered quickly an...
reviews.text: Had a simple question, which was answered quickly and clearly

reviews.title: Applied for a mortgage with the Bath Building Societ...
reviews.text: Applied for a mortgage with the Bath Building Society and from initial enquiry to getting the offer the service has been excellent . My adviser Ian Birch has been amazing . He took time to explain everything in great detail and quickly responded to any questions I had regarding my application. I cannot recommend him highly enough. Process was easy to complete and all done in a very good timescale. Was kept informed at all times and made the whole process painless. I would have no hesitation in recommending Ian and the Bath Building society.

reviews.title: Your organisation and team member Tim Randall
reviews.text: We deal with your team member Tim Randall, he was always clear with information and return any emails or telephone messages almost immediately. The communications between Tim Randall and ourselves was paramount to assist a constant flow of information needed in regarded to organising our mortgage. At all times we felt that the contact between Tim and ourselves was very personal which help us along the route. It was a pleasure to deal with such a organised team member and Tim is surely a great asset to your organisation.

reviews.title: Bathvl is good
reviews.text: Bath were one of very few building society's prepared to offer a BTL mortgage at a reasonable rate. Good Communication with them over the personal issues

reviews.title: Customer service exceptional
reviews.text: Ian Birch was exceptionally helpful as were his colleagues. Their customer service was brilliant and we would definitely recommend to family and friends.

reviews.title: Excellent service.
reviews.text: Excellent service. Great communication. Tim Randall was excellent.

reviews.title: My mortgage advisor was fantastic.
reviews.text: My mortgage advisor was fantastic. He explained all the factors relating to the type of mortgage we were entering into and was very quick in responding to queries we had both written and verbally.

reviews.title: Nick Thornton - a pleasure to deal with
reviews.text: Nick Thornton is a pure pleasure to deal with. He offers a very personal service and nothing is too much trouble. He is efficient, thorough and responds quickly. I would have no hesitation whatsoever in recommending him. He's a breath of fresh air in this world of call centres, and a credit to the Bath Building Society. Thank you for all of your help Nick

reviews.title: Nick Thornton is my mortgage manager.
reviews.text: Nick Thornton is my mortgage manager. He has been brilliant in keeping myself informed on all changes to rates etc. He has been proactive in informing myself on any new products and changes. I have full confidence with himself and Bath Building Society

reviews.title: questions quickly answered.
reviews.text: questions quickly answered friendly service

reviews.text: Very helpful staff, answered my query straight away

reviews.title: Good friendly chatbox for brokers
reviews.text: Good friendly chatbox for brokers

reviews.title: Bath Building Society: Buy for Uni Mortgage
reviews.text: My son took out a Buy for Uni mortgage with Bath and we worked with Ian Birch as our advisor, and he was excellent: very helpful and thorough at every step of the process and very responsive to our queries. The wider mortgage process team also very good and timely in responses. Overall, the whole process was seamless and would highly recommend the Bath Building Society based on this experience

reviews.title: East to contact and Great service
reviews.text: Really good experience every time I needed to make direct contact with Bath Building Society. This was important as we accessed a self build mortgage. Very east with great service when settled my account. Alexandra was fab

reviews.title: Buy for uni mortgage
reviews.text: We completed an online enquiry form regarding the student mortgage. Tim Randall contacted us really quickly and arranged an interview . In that session he explained in detail all about the mortgage and how it worked and what was required. This was extremely useful and it encouraged us to go ahead. Tim kept in contact with us throughout the whole process, even when we had additional questions . He worked with the Bath team to address any open questions and updated us promptly. Tim was super quick at relying to our emails and was a great advocate for Bath Building Society, professional and thorough. He was happy to answer even small questions we had. We were so pleased with his support and service.

reviews.title: live chat is super quick and helpful Tom is always a...
reviews.text: live chat is super quick and helpful Tom is always a delight!

reviews.title: Student mortgage
reviews.text: Tim was thorough & knowledgeable of the details of the student mortgage product, which suited our requirements. Tim & the admin team were helpful & kept up regular communication. Very pleased with the process.

reviews.title: Excellent service and excellent staff
reviews.text: All the staff we have spoken with have been extremely helpful and friendly, cannot fault any of them or the service provided

reviews.title: so quick to respond
reviews.text: so quick to respond on live chat and lend much more than other lenders for single applicants

reviews.title: Rebecca was really helpful, and very knowledgable
reviews.text: Rebecca was really helpful, and very knowledgable

reviews.title: Helpful and friendly team
reviews.text: The mortgage team and adviser who dealt with our new mortgage was friendly and helpful- we felt like Tim was getting us the best deal/option.

reviews.title: always really quick on live chat
reviews.text: always really quick on live chat

reviews.title: 8/10 would recommend
reviews.text: Great entry intot he bank with a "mortgage welcome care package" sent to our home. Where we would have loved to have seen some more proactiveness was at the end of our initial term. People are busy and we just go into the remortgage process, and we ended up leaving for a gbp 100 saving per month.... which is grea,t but if BBS were to have gotten in touch plenty in advance with a price match or competitive quote, we may have stayed as we enjoyed our experience with BBS.

reviews.title: All in all a positive experience with bath building...
reviews.text: All in all a positive experience with bath building society if I have had an issue it has been resolved quickly and efficiently.if I was in the market for another mortgage I would they would be top of my list

reviews.title: Thank you Tim and the team!
reviews.text: From the very first phone call Tim has been absolutely exceptional. He went out of his way to help me in my niche circumstances and ensured I was updated every step of the way. The service from the entire team has been speedy and professional but my experience with Tim has been outstanding. Not only did he support me in securing a better fit for my circumstances but above all he was patient and kind and is a real credit to your Company. Thank you

reviews.title: New Mortgage rate swap!
reviews.text: My Buy to let mortgage was coming to the end of its fixed period and Bath were very quick in contacting me, helping me select a new product and implemented this very quickly so that I could benefit from the better rate as soon as possible! Great service.

reviews.title: Really friendly bank with very friendly genuine staf...
reviews.text: Really friendly bank with very friendly genuine staff who care.

reviews.title: The process was very smooth, the staff are efficient...
reviews.text: The process was very smooth, the staff are efficient and the rates are best in the market!

reviews.title: Thank you to Tim and the team
reviews.text: Tim and the team were fantastic, as well as being incredibly responsive and making the process incredibly clear along the way, they went to extra efforts to make this mortgage happen. I'm incredibly grateful.

reviews.title: Nick is very experienced and he is so kind and capab...
reviews.text: Nick is very experienced and he is so kind and capable to hold our hands through the whole application process.

reviews.title: Great Service
reviews.text: Very happy with mortgage application process and service from Tim (mortgage advisor). Competitive rate and advised of an alternative cheaper product that met my needs. Only negative was the old fashioned paper application form.

reviews.title: Very quick service, smooth and efficient service
reviews.text: Very quick service. From application to mortgage offer just under 4 weeks, this at a time when all institutions were inundated with applications to beat the labour stamp duty increases. I had been advised that there would be a delay because of the SD increases so was pleasantly surprised to receive my offer in such a timely manner. Tim was especially helpful at the application stage. I have now had notice of completion. All in all a very smooth and pleasant experience Well done BIBS, impressed with you.

reviews.title: A listening approach
reviews.text: My mortgage application could have been declined because the nature of the property doesn't fully fit with the Society's lending criteria. However, there are many positives about the property - and at every stage, Society colleagues were prepared to look at potential snags in the light of the bigger picture, to arrive at a balanced and considered view on whether a mortgage could be offered in my overall circumstances.

reviews.title: Brilliant to deal with, excellent mortgage product
reviews.text: One of the best experiences I have had, over 40+ years, of dealing with a financial institution. Excellent mortgage product available, very flexible, suits our needs exactly.

reviews.title: Mortgage came up for review; process was very good a...
reviews.text: Mortgage came up for review; process was very good a customer services was excellent

reviews.title: BBS were great for our guest house mortgage
reviews.text: Bath Building Society was very flexible and set up a mortgage for our guest house. All the other lenders we approached (Lloyds, Natwest, Halifax etc.) were unable to help because we didn't fall into a standard tickbox category. The rate was always competitive, we had a series of discounted rate deals. Been with them for about 20 years. I highly recommend BBS.

reviews.title: My mortgage process was delayed because essential qu...
reviews.text: My mortgage process was delayed because essential questions were not asked promptly by Bath at the outset. This delay ended up costing me over £1000 due to being on the SVR with my previous provider. The app itself is difficult to use and lacks necessary information accessibility. While I was satisfied with the rate during my mortgage term, any potential savings were negated by the delays in the initial months, largely caused by Bath. Based on this experience, I cannot recommend Bath and will not return.

reviews.title: Very personal service.
reviews.text: Very personal service. Tim was extremely helpful and his emails always very quick to respond with questions we had. The process was quite slick from start to finish, and we were kept informed of progress along the way.

reviews.title: Very friendly helpful staff.
reviews.text: Very friendly helpful staff. Efficient service

reviews.title: Brilliant mortgage provider
reviews.text: This mortgage was great for my first home purchase. They made the process simple and easy to understand. Whenever I was unsure of anything, I could call and speak to someone. The service feels personal and would highly recommend them.

reviews.title: Excellent Service.
reviews.text: Tim Randall was very knowledgeable, clear and concise about Bath's products. When he said he would do something, he did it. We were kept informed throughout the process and he answered any questions and concerns. He was excellent.

reviews.title: friendly and helpful from the start.
reviews.text: friendly and helpful from the start. Kept informed throughout.

reviews.title: First, it's very slow. Many last minute surprises
reviews.text: First, it's slow, very slow. Next dont get your hopes up. Everything seemed great (but slow). Finally we received the offer long after we hoped to exchange. The offer contained a number of demands that contradicted the information supplied in the application, literally impossible & impractical demands. So we are now having to start the entire process again. Find a new property, make a fresh application, etc. It would have been better if they had suggested that it's riverside location could raise problems rather than wait months to be congratulated with impossible demands. If you wanted to say No to the property just say so Don't say Yes and then ask the impossible like no site fees for a house on a private road and insist on preferential treatment on non-allacoted parking. Numpties! Even the surveyor got the house age wrong by 20 years. They also requested 50% more charge against my parents property than discussed during the application. As a first time buyer, this couldn't have been disheartening.

reviews.title: Helpful and courteous
reviews.text: My contact with BBS staff has always been a positive experience.

reviews.title: difficult getting through telephone lines, wish it w...
reviews.text: difficult getting through telephone lines, wish it was easier

reviews.title: Bath Building Society provide a traditional approach...
reviews.text: Bath Building Society provide a traditional approach genuine customer service. They are contactable, with real people to speak to, always respond to calls and enquiries and are approachable to advise and support. I cannot praise them too highly and have happily recommended them already to friends and peers.

reviews.title: A longstanding professional relationship
reviews.text: I have been a borrower for some 25 years. My mortgage rate had expired and my mortgage was getting near to end of term. The mortgage department delivered reliable, good service in order to assist me.

reviews.title: Tim helped me to understand everything in simple ter...
reviews.text: Tim helped me to understand everything in simple terms and was very helpful and communicative throughout the process

reviews.title: Good service but sometimes slow
reviews.text: Customer service was good but some of the internal processes seemed very slow. We received excellent prompt responses when we chased for progress but would have preferred not to have to chase either by quicker processes or regular updates.

reviews.title: Tom is very experienced and thoughtful.
reviews.text: Tom is very experienced and thoughtful.

reviews.text: Tom was super helpful, helped me get started with my first case

reviews.title: Excellent from start to finish!
reviews.text: Excellent from start to finish! One of only a few companies that offer a buy-for-uni mortgage so that was a good start. Every step of the way we were treated with professionalism and told what was happening. I could not recommend you more!!!

reviews.title: Overall good. Just slow.
reviews.text: They are just slow as the process seems manual for the mortgage. Everything turned out good though. So just be prepared for a slow application.

reviews.title: Rebekka is a diamond,so helpful with full understand...
reviews.text: Rebekka is a diamond,so helpful with full understanding of my reasonable request.Acted fast and be really empathetic for my case which this showed me an excellent customer service and a higher level of reliability Well done!

reviews.title: Very thorough and professional service.
reviews.text: Very thorough and professional service.

reviews.title: Myself and my husband both had a tricky credit histo...
reviews.text: Myself and my husband both had a tricky credit history whch on paper would have looked bad but we were recommended to contact Bath Building Society for their mortgages and were very pleased to find out they take a personal and human approach and came to talk with us rather than use an impersonal online form. After explaining our history and providing evidence of our current incomes we were given a mortgage. It was one of the happiest moments for us after years of uphill struggle.

reviews.title: Excellent customer service
reviews.text: Excellent customer service - a sensible caring evaluation of my needs and proposal of the most suitable product to mee them.

reviews.title: THE exemplar of the best
reviews.text: Bath Building Society is an, no probably THE exemplar of how to balance digital excellence with warm and receptive personal customer/member service. At a time when on-line and customer services among financial services providers and public utilities are far from an acceptable level of service BBS are a joy to deal with. Whatever the Society does to imbue all its staff with what makes a society if they could bottle it it would be what everyone went for. Every contact is a demonstration that being nice, professional and helpful people to deal with doesn't have to be neglected to be a commercial success.

reviews.title: 1st class branch customer servive
reviews.text: 1st class branch customer servive

reviews.title: Tim Randall, mortgage advisor, has been a great help...
reviews.text: Tim Randall, mortgage advisor, has been a great help during our buy-to-let mortgage application. He ensured a smooth and speedy process, chased things up when needed, and kept me updated throughout. If the interest rates had been a bit more favorable, I would have given 5 stars all the way.

reviews.title: I have a buy for uni mortgage which has been really...
reviews.text: I have a buy for uni mortgage which has been really helpful and unique experience to own my own property at such a young age.

reviews.title: Innovative products - hands on manual approach - is...
reviews.text: Innovative products - hands on manual approach - is ideal in some client scenarios.

reviews.title: Great customer service!
reviews.text: Tom and Rebecca have been super helpful with all my queries regarding one particularly tricky case. Nothing is ever too much to ask.

reviews.title: Fantastic service & product transfer rate
reviews.text: I have a holiday let mortgage with Bath BS & when it came to find a new product, not only were they very friendly & helpful, they also had the best rate on the market & didn't charge a fee. I love that they give their current customers the best rates possible & don't try and squeeze every penny from them.

reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with Bath Building Society! :-)
reviews.text: I couldn't be more happy with Bath Building Society. I've been with them since 2009 and I just moved house and although I could have got cheaper rates elsewhere, as their customer service is superb I was happy to stay with them. They always reply quickly, with real people you can talk to and they couldn't do more for you. Well done Bath Building Society and thank you! :-)

reviews.title: My wife and I remortgaged to BBS
reviews.text: My wife and I remortgaged to BBS with a relatively small mortgage (under £80k) but the underwritering process was unduly lengthy in my opinion given the loan to value (house valued in excess of £500k), but have clean credit file and good income. The process to make overpayments, in my opinion is flawed and should be reviewed. Lastly, the app really did not provide me with much informaiton inc. what over payment allowances were remaining - so really is pretty pointless as I see it

reviews.title: Really helpful

reviews.text: quick to respond and provided clear concise information

reviews.text: No problem with the product offered by painfully slow process that ended up failing to complete because the vendor's circumstances changed in the meantime

reviews.title: BIBS SERVICE
reviews.text: VERY PROFESSIONAL TEAM, ALWAYS ACCESSIBLE, GREAT PRODUCTS AND SERVICE, GREAT EXPERIENCE

reviews.title: Application processing unacceptably slow
reviews.text: We made an application for a mortgage on a new purchase in early June 2024. After many delays and several long turnarounds for information provided, we finally received a mortgage offer on 6th September 2024. Unfortunately, we have not bee able to proceed wit the purchase because the vendor died just the week befire the offer was received. It is unusual that delays have such an impact but it is always a risk when every piece of information takes so long to review. In this case, the delay has destroyed the sale and cost all of us considerable time and money.

reviews.title: Quick and Rebekkah was able to answer my query super...
reviews.text: Quick and Rebekkah was able to answer my query super fast

reviews.title: Natasha was great.
reviews.text: Natasha was great. Actioned everything I asked there and then via live chat

reviews.title: I asked to change my bank details.
reviews.text: I asked to change my bank details. Email sent with direct debit form. Very quick but the chat box layout on an iPhone is terrible. But other than that helpful chat

reviews.title: Everything was smooth albeit super slow!
reviews.text: Everything was smooth albeit super slow!!! It seems everything is manual which can be a good thing if you have special circumstances. All good in the end!

reviews.title: FirstReview
reviews.text: I was impressed about the money I could potentially borrow for a mortgage.

reviews.title: Excellent service from Bath Building Society
reviews.text: Excellent service from Bath Building Society - intelligent pro-active staff who understood their products and processes and were oriented to assisting me with a slightly complex transaction so all went very smoothly - totally customer-centric !

reviews.title: 24 years on, with perfect customer service
reviews.text: I took my first mortgage out with the Bath in 2000. Since then I have had several mortgage and savings product. My last mortgage was granted during the days of Mr and Mrs Hodgman running the Society. I recently had to make some changes to my mortgage and the Society, including the Mortgage Team were outstanding in terms of customer service, speed of reaction, engagement and a 'can do' approach. The experience was exactly the same from my perspective when you used to have to go and see Mr and Mrs Hodgman for tea and a chat to see if you had been successful for a mortgage. I must name check Craig in the mortgage team who is an absolute credit to the Society and he was so helpful to me. It's a pleasure to do business with the Society and I highly recommend them, as their values and their integrity do not change.

reviews.title: 4 words to summarise
reviews.text: Helpful, personable, realistic and empathetic

reviews.title: Chat contact was very helpful!
reviews.text: initial contact on chat with Oliver has been a great one. he provided the required info quickly

reviews.title: good chat - responder was pleasant and helpful
reviews.text: good chat - responder was pleasant and helpful

reviews.title: Buy for Uni mortgage
reviews.text: We applied for a niche product, a Buy for Uni mortgage, which is only offered by 3 lenders. In fact, of the 3, the Bath BS was the only one that could meet all our criteria. Excellent service from start to finish with supportive and informative advice from Tim Randell. The application form was a little old fashioned, completed in pen and posted back! But in reality it was no problem. It was processed quickly and the offer made without any real delays.

reviews.title: very good meetings with Ian Birch, who calmly and he...
reviews.text: very good meetings with Ian Birch, who calmly and helpfully took us through two separate applications. Very grateful to him

reviews.title: asked for rate updates got details
reviews.text: asked for rate updates got details

reviews.title: Tim Randall is an absolute credit to the organisation
reviews.text: Tim helped us with securing a mortgage, in quite complex and trying circumstances,. His communication, diligence, professionalism, and kindness made a very difficult time much easier. I genuinely think that other agents might have given up on us, but Tim drove the process to completion. Really can't thank him enough.

reviews.title: Helpful staff provided easy and clear information ab...
reviews.text: Helpful staff provided easy and clear information about my case that is with the lender. Definitely feels like a human being approach rather than a PC

reviews.title: Excellent help and service throughout
reviews.text: Excellent service and very explanatory throughout

reviews.title: Mortgage Application Process
reviews.text: I had an excellent experience Working with Bath Building Society. Tim managed my application and he did a fantastic job at making sure everything ran smoothly and sufficiently.

reviews.title: Thank you Oliver for going all out to assist me subm...
reviews.text: Thank you Oliver for going all out to assist me submitting an application

reviews.title: Bath Building Society gave us a break
reviews.text: We have had 3 mortgages with Bath Building Society over the last 35 years and are now mortgage free. They were the only company who would listen to us when buying our first home and won’t forget that they trusted us and provided us with that first rudder to the housing market. Thank you

reviews.title: Effortless process
reviews.text: Effortless process, We had it packaged by Buildloan and from offer to completion it took around 2 weeks

reviews.title: Clear and efficient communication
reviews.text: Our mortgage advisor was very clear and helpful in talking and seeing us through the process when we had queries. We felt he welcomed our contact and was always efficient when replying to our communications.

reviews.title: BATH BUILDING SOCIETY
reviews.text: An excellent lender who are in touch with the needs of their clients and who always try to help in a positive manner

reviews.title: Superb customer service! Thank you!
reviews.text: I've had a mortgage with Bath building society for 15 years . I was made redundant just before Christmas 2011 and was out of work for 3 whole months and couldn't pay the mortgage. When I contacted Bath they were very decent about it and when I did find another job they were flexible about the repayments. Above all they didn't make me feel humiliated like I was begging which I couldn't say for my own bank or other providers. Well done Bath and thank you, your kindness was not forgotten!

reviews.title: Had my mortgage with bath building society for years...
reviews.text: Had my mortgage with bath building society for years and always great communication and fair pricing

reviews.title: Professional, friendly and knowledgeable team.

reviews.text: I left a product Variation until the final day of 7 from the date of the letter from Bath BS, it was late afternoon and yet Adam still accommodated this late application and got it through in time, brilliant work I must say.

reviews.title: Small enough to care!
reviews.text: Quick and helpful to deal with over 25 years. Flexible with my changing requirements

reviews.title: New mortgage - specialist product
reviews.text: Great service from start to finish on a more specialised mortgage product. The best part was the fact that I had named people who I could contact, who were all very helpful and responsive - not like the large faceless organisations we are all used to dealing with these days. I would highly recommend Bath

reviews.title: Buy for Uni Mortgage a Success
reviews.text: Thank you for your support with our Buy for Uni Mortgage. After 3.5 years my daughter has graduated, secured a job and the mortgage has now completed. I’d just like to say thank you for offering such a flexible product. It was a pleasure doing business with BBS. It transformed my daughter’s university life. She was able to live in a comfortable house and was in control of sorting out any day to day repairs. The Buy for Uni product gave us the flexibility we needed to have tenants or rent the property. Knowing she had full flexibility over the use of the property was a great peace of mind. My daughter secured a job after graduation and decided to take over the mortgage of the property on a repayment basis. I hope this boost to get on the property ladder will stand her in good stead. The BBS team were easy to contact and quickly responded to our questions. In today's world it was a pleasure to deal with someone directly and not through several layers of call center operatives. Thank you again.

reviews.title: Easy and quick online chat would use again.
reviews.text: Easy and quick online chat would use again.

reviews.text: We have recently taken out a 'buy for university' mortgage with Bath BS. From start to finish, all of your staff have been absolutely excellent but a particular shout out to Ian Birch, Rebekka and Jalani (the latter, both in the mortgage admin team). Our application was not that straightforward and under short timescales but the support of your staff could not have been better. I'm also aware that there were many staff that I did not engage directly with that supported our application.

reviews.title: Phone chat
reviews.text: No complaints about how Nick treated the call. very friendly and personal but disappointed with the outcome as there seems to be no good reason why a person handicapped through dementia (itself a mental illness) is treated differently when it comes to mortgages to someone with an equally permanent mental disability where both sets of family have lasting power of attorney or in our case deputyship in terms of lifetime mortgages. It does seem discriminatory and contrary to the DDA

reviews.title: The Superstars at Bath Building Society
reviews.text: I have been a loyal customer of Bath Building Society for several years. In my opinion, the Bath Building Society is the epitome of excellence. I believe the staff must all be Superstars as the work they do is truly amazing. If you want the best then use Bath Building Society.

reviews.title: webchat service is great help
reviews.text: great speedy service from webchat.

reviews.title: Excellent Communication
reviews.text: Tim R. has been fantastic - always so willing to answer any questions I have, no matter how big or small, and is always quick to reply. This is definitely making the process a lot less daunting than it otherwise would be for a first-time buyer like myself!

reviews.title: Very easy mortgage process
reviews.text: The mortgage advisor Tim was very helpful and made the process easy for us, I would recommend them without hesitation.

reviews.title: Very slow process, lots of obstacles.
reviews.text: While we are delighted to work with a local business and to be issued with a mortgage, the process took nearly 7 months. We hoped to complete end of May, and we've completed end of July. This means our family will be without a home for 2 months while building work is carried out, impinging on our 10 year old and 13 year old's school term. I understand the need to scrutinise our finances and to ensure the property will be worth it's value, but we are both in well paid jobs, with an extra property as additional security and we sought a 50% mortgage, with the remainder in cash. I would hope that we represent attractive customers with this kind of LTV. The property is clearly a good deal, given that most refurbished properties on the street go for £1.2 million In spite of this, our finances were scrutinised to a level we've not seen from prior lenders, asking about individual lines on our bank statements and the cost of my train tickets to London. The survey was deeper than normal, taking up extra time.. BIBS is retaining 5% while we complete the work: we are buying the house to do the work, in order for a young family to live in. We have no choice but to do the work. Finally, at the last minute, we were asked to submit approved building regs, prior to work starting. Given that building regs can only be formally approved AFTER the work is complete. This added a further 4 week delay. Our solicitor, building control and agent, have never seen in a process like this, and they all have over 20 years experience. I completely understand the vital nature of financial control and the avoidance of taking on a risk that would expose the financial system, but I cannot see the value of this level of scrutiny given our financial situation and the property. We have respected your conditions throughout, but it's caused a huge amount of anxiety in our house which appeared entirely unnecessary. In future, I would suggest that some of these conditions are laid out earlier in the process, we could have ensured we were ready for the extra scrutiny, and secure building control approval much earlier. Some of the lead times in communications could be speeded up. I would suggest we could have completed in May, had there been improved communication and expectations set clearly in advance. Again, I am delighted to be able to support a local business and I'm delighted that we have a mortgage in place: thank you.

reviews.title: Bot 0 - Nick 1
reviews.text: Bea still needs some training but, thanks to Nick, I got the information I needed. Not what I wanted but clear and understandable criteria guidance. Saved time waiting for a call to be answered.

reviews.title: Always wonderful service
reviews.text: Always wonderful service, super friendly and I like that they are local.

reviews.title: Fantastic service
reviews.text: Can't complain, always been treated well and it's easy to contact if needed.

reviews.text: Immediate response from the agent - Called Nick. Answered all my Questions relating to BTL Mortgage.

reviews.text: I wanted to start a remortgage application and used the instant chat function to get the process started. It was very quick and easy, I downloaded the application form and fact sheet within in minutes of starting the chat.

reviews.title: Excellent product, Professional service
reviews.text: We applied for a "Uni-Mortgage" and from the outset meeting we had with Tim Randall the introduction, details of the product and the application process was clearly, articulately and professional explained to us. Throughout the whole process from initial meeting to offer letter Tim supported us through the entire process and had an accurate understanding of our situation, his commitment to navigate us through the application process was stead-fast & professional, which was greatly appreciated, he has an impressive work ethic & tenacity and is a credit to Bath Building Society Thank-you Tim

reviews.title: Uni Mortgage

reviews.title: Pleasure to deal with
reviews.text: Have just dealt with the Bath Building Society for the first time in many years and have been really impressed with their professionalism and courtesy. Special mention to Ingrida who dealt with our delay in submitting the Certificate of Title in a calm and friendly manner and who ensured that funds were released in time for completion. Shame all borrowers don't use you!!

reviews.title: Slow to act and respond
reviews.text: Quite possibly the worst mortgage experience in our lives. My wife and I are purchasing a property and the slow response times of Bath and inability to keep to service levels was quite shocking, at one point risking the transaction as our vendor started to lose patience. The BD manager admitted that staffing issues were leading to delays, but there was no proactive communication of such delays until deadline after deadline was missed. The whole mortgage process took over 3 months to conclude.

reviews.title: Efficient
reviews.text: Fairly efficient Building society when comes to new mortgage process.

reviews.title: Chocolate teapot comes to mind
reviews.text: As a joint mortgage holder I have no access to any of the mortgage information. I am not able to access the mobile app as it doesn't recognise me and they dont do online banking. They have however confirmed that if the primary mortgage holder defaults they will then contact me (after my credit rating has been affected). Overall my experience with them and their customer service has been very poor.

reviews.title: Personal and helpful!
reviews.text: My query was a little complicated so rather than continue via typed messages, Oliver gave me his number so we could chat it through and move forward to help my client - excellent service!

reviews.title: Helpful as always
reviews.text: From initially receiving excellent advice regarding Retirement Mortgages to responding to queries since, we have always found staff at Bath to be helpful and friendly.

reviews.title: First class service from a very helpful organisation
reviews.text: We were looking to purchase a property for our son to live in for up to 3 years whilst he was living in another part of the U.K. The Bath Building Society’s Buy for Uni student mortgage product was exactly what we were looking for. However, as well as having a market leading product, they also had a team of people behind it that took the time and trouble to understand our circumstances and come up with a finance offer. Have nothing but praise for the way we were looked after,

reviews.text: I would like to express my appreciation for the way my remortgage has been handled by Bath Building Society. I was offered a product that exactly suited my circumstances and which was a great relief to me at the time. It has since been serviced efficiently and promptly, and I have at all times felt that I had the help that I needed.

reviews.title: Not great legal work
reviews.text: Relatively slow process and high (unnecessary?) fees. Not impressed by the solicitor handling the case for BBS. Although I recognise they are acting for BBS and not on my behalf they were fairly uncommunicative, incorrectly quoted fees for work, slow to update information (e.g. completion statements were out of data and therefore inaccurate) , incorrect statements, left requests for vital (and large) fees until less than 1 hour before completion deadline. Charging £35 for completing the process online instead of by post? in the 21st century???? Some kind of joke?

reviews.title: wonderful young man Oliver delight to chat to and his contact broker Nick equally wonderful clear and open - really fast service - delighted
reviews.text: oliver and nick - great people to chat too both need a 50% pay increase

reviews.title: One in a million.
reviews.text: When we true to get our first mortgage no one would look at us then we went off to Bath Investment Building Society and had a chat. The lady who I can’t remember her name reassured us and asked us to prepare a spreadsheet of our outgoings and incomings etc. this was a non-traditional approach and very welcoming. We went off and carefully prepared our report and a good case of why Bath Investment Building Society should give us a mortgage. She went through all the figs carefully and within one week we had an offer. We understand there was a risk here but they took it. Since our first mortgage in 1989 we’ve had 5 mortgages with Bath and ar happy to say we are now mortgage free. Thank you for believing in us and giving us a chance to get on the property market. We are forever grateful. Debbie and Patrick Batheaston

reviews.title: Unique product range
reviews.text: A good range of products to fit the most unique set of requirements. Fantastic

reviews.title: Remortgage
reviews.text: Very easy process to remortgage by btl over to Bath. My advisor was great throughout the process, he was very knowledgeable and professional.

reviews.title: Very helpful service
reviews.text: My chat request was answered very quickly, and clear answers were given. Nick was extremely helpful and pleasant.

reviews.title: Good product but time-consuming
reviews.text: The mortgage advisor at Bath (Ian Birch) was excellent and always responded immediately to any questions. I cannot rate him highly enough! Once the application was submitted however, the process became more arduous. For example my husband and I were asked for a signed gift letter, this had already been submitted. We were also asked for statements for an account that we didn’t have - turned out that this was our daughter’s account and the request should have been sent to her. It also wasn’t made clear at the initial application that screen shots would not be acceptable - if this had been stated it would have saved a lot of time. And the whole process took so long that we were requested to provide yet more bank statements as the ones that had been submitted were out of date! It also would have been helpful to be informed via email that our mortgage offer had been made, as with the postal strike it took several days to reach us and the sellers were getting anxious.

reviews.title: Bit of a problem but sorted very quickly by talking to the right man!!
reviews.text: I had some problems getting documents I needed to do with my Buy to Let mortgages. This was due to either misunderstandings, or lack or knowledge or training. After several failed attempts I phoned Ben Hutchings who had helped me in the past, he put wheels in motion and sorted immediately even though it wasn't really his responsibility. Thank you Ben!!!

reviews.title: Efficient, Helpful and Contactable
reviews.text: We have just completed our re-mortgage to the Bath Building Society. Our first very positive experience was that the mortgage deal we were offered in September '22 was the deal we now have in January '23 - a period when the mortgage market dramatically changed and where mortgage products and offers in principle were being withdrawn. We found the underwriting process efficient and thorough which is, frankly, reassuring. However, the stand out feature for us was the ability to communicate with members of the mortgage admin team, quickly, by telephone or email, who were able to deal with our enquiries there and then and when they couldn't actually got back in contact with us within a few hours with the answer. This has not been our experience with other financial institutions. It's also worth noting how friendly and courteous everyone we have come into contact with has been.

reviews.title: Generally so so ...
reviews.text: The online chat function was brilliant and I got the answer I was looking for. However the experience I had setting up this mortgage was not great and my advisor complained formally. The issue generally surrounded the slow pace at which the application was reviewed and we almost lost out on our property. That said, the online chat was great and I hope my opinion continues to change. I appreciate it's a tricking time.

reviews.title: They got me a mortgage!
reviews.text: Tim Randall has been absolutely amazing and very professional! He kept me informed throughout the entire process, he was very efficient at getting back to me regarding any queries I had and went above and beyond to get my house re-mortgaged! I was able to re-mortgage at the most difficult time when deals were being pulled from the market, left, right and centre and interest rates were rising due to the bank of England rising their rates. I would 100% recommend Tim and Bath Building Society.

reviews.title: Great pre-application service
reviews.text: All the information on the website was clear and the chat function on the website is really quick, easy and informative.

reviews.title: Innovative Product for our times
reviews.text: The severe shortages of rental accommodation in Edinburgh for my student son last April led me to search for a guarantor type mortgage. I found the 'buy for university' product and it ticked all the boxes. We were lucky to have Tim as our advisor and he was fantastic, any questions he responded promptly and kept us informed as the underwriter review dragged on a little bit. There were some restrictions to the mortgage which limited what we could buy. Eventually we found a place and our offer was accepted. The approval process took 8 weeks to complete from submission of the application. One suggestion for improvement would be in regard to the extra security, it was not clear to us what documents were needed and this caused some panic and delay post the mortgage offer. But a great product overall.

reviews.title: Professional
reviews.text: Very helpful and very professional with good interest rates. I am glad i found them through our mortgage broker highly recommend who are looking for stress free lender

reviews.title: Poor service
reviews.text: Very poor contact.Lost count on the amount of calls made. No pace no urgency or keeping customers informed. Nearly 5 months to process once signed the documents. Raised a formal complaint. Was fobbed off when challenged. Could have been so much better. Very poor

reviews.title: Easy remortgage prices
reviews.text: Great communication, designated contact made the process relatively rubble free

reviews.title: Financial Services as they should be
reviews.text: Dealing with most financial services organisations is, for a large part, a demonstration of how customers come a distant second to under invested technology systems and computer dictated processes. BBS is a demonstration of how an organisation can demonstrate that it and every one in the organisation values and cares for customers at the same time as it deals with the regulatory framework and commercial considerations of the sector in which it operates..

reviews.title: First class service
reviews.text: Prior to my application with Bath, I had applied with one of the major lenders but was Essentially through that process messed about. I decided to go with Bath and felt thoroughly supported and kept in the loop through the process. My solicitors comments were that this was by far the best mortgage firm they had dealt with. Bath was responsive , experienced and super efficient. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Brilliant help over the online chat

reviews.title: Very responsive and quick
reviews.text: All questions answered quickly and the chat works great.

reviews.title: Building height restriction is too strict for 2022
reviews.text: The online chat was great and helped me get a quick answer to my question but the reason I wouldn’t be able to recommend Bath Building Society to friends and Family is due to the strict building height rules for lending criteria. They do not lend on buildings over 6 storeys high which in today’s economy especially for borrowers in London; is extremely unhelpful as most London new builds are well over 10 floors. Other than that, I thought they would have been a great lender option so it’s such a shame!

reviews.title: A pleasure to deal with
reviews.text: Ian and the team provided a smooth, quick and professional service and made the whole process painless

reviews.title: Remortgage to Bath Building Society
reviews.text: Tim was fantastic at keeping me up to date on the progress of my application. I would highly recommend using Bath Building Society.

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.text: Just wanted to say thank you for giving us the opportunity to purchase our first ever home. With a not so perfect credit rating I am so thankful you gave us the chance to become homeowners when others said no. Your customer service is excellent and you always provided updates to my broker on our case which made the whole process less stressful. Thank you Bath BS!!

reviews.title: Brilliant service! Highly recommend!
reviews.text: Ian and the team at BBS were amazing. Ian was super helpful, knowledgeable, kind and considerate. He made the application process so easy and was available if I had any issues. The admin team were quick and thorough. These guys honestly have such amazing mortgage service, it way exceeds most of the larger high street mortgage lenders. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them.

reviews.title: great service, helpful and knowledgeable
reviews.text: Great service, from the first person I spoke to the re-mortgage has been problem free and easy. High recommend.

reviews.title: Professional and personal, first class in all aspects.
reviews.text: A refreshing change to be a customer of an organisation that clearly see its members as individuals. How nice to be able to talk to somebody on the phone without having to go through countless menu options. Queries always dealt with promptly and with clarity. I would highly recommend.

reviews.title: What you are offering is amazing
reviews.text: Thankyou so much for offering the Buy for Uni mortgage

reviews.title: Nick was prompt and knowledgeable
reviews.text: really good quick service, very refreshing

reviews.text: Mortgage processed quickly and efficiently despite a couple of non-standard details in the application. Excellent personal attention from staff throughout.

reviews.title: Professional service
reviews.text: Smooth application process, responsive and friendly staff, would recommend your services.

reviews.title: Fixed rate query
reviews.text: Understandably the fixed rates have been pulled but the chat function and assistance was very handy.

reviews.title: Tom was very helpful
reviews.text: I was looking to find out more about a rather niche product, but Tom was very quick, professional, and helpful. I would thoroughly recommend him.

reviews.title: Excellent on live chat, not good at returning calls
reviews.text: Having used Bath for the first time, they could do with making their system more user friendly.

reviews.title: Nick helped quickly
reviews.text: Nick called me which was a nice touch and we resolved the query quickly, so really efficient for us both

reviews.title: Communication
reviews.text: Communication is not very great, however when through to chat with someone they were helpful. They didn't have my email address on the system to request additional documents from me, despite communicated via email while initiating the process of mortgage application. so clear gap in departments.

reviews.title: Lovely experience
reviews.text: Lovely professionals. Questions answered fast and precise.

reviews.title: Got there in the end
reviews.text: Very slow, took 6 months to agree a simple mortgage, seemingly very picky and to some extent box ticking. On the plus side, terms were favourable and the service was more personal than other mortgage lenders. We used a broker but in hindsight I think dealing direct would have been much better, also note BBS will only deal with solicitors not a conveyancing company, broker should have (but didn't) advised this.

reviews.title: Quick Service
reviews.text: Great work from Oliver on the chat desk. Really efficient and got me to the right answer quickly.

reviews.title: Very efficient and friendly
reviews.text: Nick was great, he came across as knowledgeable and helped with my query very quickly

reviews.title: Good service
reviews.text: The chat facility is good. Oliver and Tom have been helpful

reviews.title: Great service!
reviews.text: Although I wasn't able to get all of the answers I required immediately, Oliver had no hesitation in providing me with details to contact him via email where he would be able to help me further with my query. It gave me confidence that I would always have help when needed from Bath Building Society

reviews.title: mixed bag
reviews.text: Tim, the advisor was brilliant; available, supportive and prepared to listen and respond flexibly. The staff are all very pleasant and available. However, we encountered difficulties with the underwriters, who made things hard going and all innovation for solutions to the problems we encountered had to come from us. They seemed to be overly cautious and, in our view, a bit tick boxy in approach. We were required to undertake legal advice for three adult kids and ourselves which didn't tell us anything we didn't already know (I'm trained as a lawyer!) at a cost of nearly £1000 when the advice for the kids could be summarised; you have no rights now but this charge means you are signing away your non-existent rights! If we hadn't been under so much time pressure in the purchase I think we probably would have sought a different provider (despite Tim).

reviews.title: Broker Support
reviews.text: Nick was great along with Adam, very supportive and knowledgeable

reviews.title: great service
reviews.text: Efficient, helpful, great service being received on my urgent case.
